author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Fix the era modifier for the DQM BeamSpot clients.

#### PR validation:
Compiles - 12_0_X version should be tested in Playback at P5.

#### Backport
Will provide backport to 12_1_X and 12_0_X


FYI: @gennai @mtosi @mmusich @dzuolo @vmariani
title: Fix era for DQM BeamSpot clients
